directions: Mix together the mayonnaise, sour cream, leek soup mix, vegetable soup mix, paprika, black pepper, jicama, red bell pepper, green onion, and spinach in a bowl. Chill at least 3 hours or overnight.
ingredients: 1 (1.8 ounce) package dry leek soup mix
1 (1.8 ounce) packet dry vegetable soup mix
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
title: Jicama Spinach Dip
